statements: SELECT id, policy_number, premium_amount, premium_date FROM premiums;
SELECT policy_number, premium_amount, premium_date, id FROM premiums;
SELECT premium_date, premium_amount, id, policy_number FROM premiums;
SELECT id, premium_date, policy_number, premium_amount FROM premiums;
SELECT * FROM premiums WHERE premium_amount > 1000;
SELECT id, policy_number, premium_amount, premium_date FROM premiums WHERE premium_amount > 1000 ORDER BY premium_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, policy_number, premium_amount FROM premiums WHERE premium_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY premium_amount ASC;
SELECT id, policy_number, premium_date FROM premiums WHERE premium_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY policy_number ASC, premium_date DESC;
SELECT id, policy_number, premium_amount, premium_date FROM premiums WHERE policy_number LIKE '%XYZ%' ORDER BY premium_amount DESC;
SELECT id, policy_number, premium_date FROM premiums WHERE premium_date BETWEEN '2022-02-01' AND '2022-03-01' ORDER BY policy_number ASC, premium_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM premiums;
SELECT policy_id, amount, date FROM premiums WHERE policy_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM premiums WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT policy_id, amount FROM premiums WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_id, amount, date FROM premiums ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT amount, date, policy_id FROM premiums WHERE date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT policy_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM premiums GROUP BY policy_id HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM premiums WHERE amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY policy_id;
SELECT claim_id, amount, date FROM claims_payments WHERE date < '2021-06-01' ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT policy_id, amount FROM premiums UNION SELECT policy_id, amount FROM claims_payments ORDER BY policy_id ASC, amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM premiums;
SELECT policy_number, premium_amount FROM premiums WHERE id = 10;
SELECT claim_number, payment_amount FROM claims_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT id, policy_number FROM reserves ORDER BY policy_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM premiums WHERE premium_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT * FROM premiums WHERE policy_number = 123
SELECT id, claim_number FROM claims_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY claim_number DESC
SELECT policy_number, SUM(premium_amount) AS total_premium FROM premiums GROUP BY policy_number
SELECT claim_number, payment_amount FROM claims_payments WHERE claim_number BETWEEN 100 AND 200 AND payment_amount < 5000 ORDER BY claim_number
SELECT policy_number, AVG(reserve_amount) AS avg_reserve FROM reserves GROUP BY policy_number HAVING AVG(reserve_amount) > 500
SELECT * FROM premiums;
SELECT policy_number, premium_amount FROM premiums WHERE payment_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT id, policy_number, reserve_amount FROM reserves ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM claims_payments WHERE payment_amount > 5000;
SELECT company_name, financial_rating, reserve_surplus FROM financial_health WHERE financial_rating = 'AAA';
SELECT * FROM premiums WHERE premium_amount > 1000
SELECT policy_number, premium_amount FROM premiums ORDER BY premium_amount DESC
SELECT claim_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM claims_payments WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT company_name, financial_rating FROM financial_health WHERE financial_rating = 'A+'
SELECT * FROM reserves WHERE policy_number LIKE '%ABC%'
SELECT id, policy_number, premium_amount, payment_date FROM premiums;
SELECT claim_number, payment_amount, payment_date FROM claims_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM reserves ORDER BY reserve_amount DESC;
SELECT policyholder_name, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM policies WHERE policy_start_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT id, username, email, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM premiums WHERE premium_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT policy_number, reserve_amount FROM reserves WHERE policy_number LIKE 'POL-%';
SELECT claim_number, payment_amount, payment_date FROM claims_payments WHERE payment_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM policies WHERE policy_start_date > '2022-01-01' AND policy_end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
